attachmentHtml:
PC Number: 2007-1972

Date: 2007-12-13

Sur recommandation du ministre de la Justice, le Comité du Conseil privé recommande que Donald J. Manderscheid, de la ville d’Edmonton dans la province d’Alberta, l'un des conseillers juridiques de Sa Majesté, soit nommé juge de la Cour du Banc de la Reine de l'Alberta, et membre d'office de la Cour d'appel de l'Alberta.


The Committee of the Privy Council, on the recommendation of the Minister of Justice, advises that Donald J. Manderscheid, of the City of Edmonton, in the Province of Alberta, one of Her Majesty's Counsel learned in the law, be appointed a Justice of the Court of Queen's Bench of Alberta, and a member ex officio of the Court of Appeal of Alberta.

The Committee of the Privy Council, on the recommendation of the Minister of Justice, advises that Donald J. Manderscheid, of the City of Edmonton, in the Province of Alberta, one of Her Majesty's Counsel learned in the law, be appointed a Justice of the Court of Queen's Bench of Alberta, and a member ex officio of the Court of Appeal of Alberta.
